name: Leonardo DRS, Inc.
description: Leonardo DRS, Inc. is a leading provider of advanced defense technologies and solutions for the U.S. military and allied forces around the world. Established as a part of the Leonardo S.p.A. group, DRS focuses on delivering high-tech systems and services that enhance the effectiveness and safety of defense operations. The company specializes in various domains, including electronic warfare, C4ISR (Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance), and advanced sensors. DRS is particularly known for its cutting-edge solutions in situational awareness, thermal imaging, and mission-critical communication systems that are vital for modern military operations. With a commitment to innovation, DRS invests heavily in research and development to foster next-generation technologies that support national security. The company's wide-ranging portfolio not only serves the defense sector but also extends into commercial markets, showcasing its versatility and expertise in advanced technologies. As global security challenges evolve, Leonardo DRS continues to play a pivotal role in shaping defense capabilities and ensuring mission success for its clients.
